title: Community Center Fitness Class Announcement
content:
Dear Community Members,

We are pleased to announce that the Riverside Community Center will begin offering a new series of fitness classes starting next month. These classes are designed for participants of all experience levels and aim to help residents stay active and improve their overall health.

The new program includes three types of classes: morning yoga, afternoon aerobics, and evening strength training. Each session lasts 45 minutes and will be led by certified instructors. Classes will take place in Room B on the first floor of the center.

Participants are encouraged to bring their own water bottles, towels, and workout mats. All necessary fitness equipment, such as weights and resistance bands, will be provided by the center. Please arrive at least ten minutes before your scheduled class to allow time for check-in.

Registration opens next Monday and can be completed through our website under the “Programs” section. Space is limited, so we recommend signing up early to secure your preferred time. If you have any questions or need assistance with the registration process, please contact us at info@riversidecc.org.

We look forward to seeing you at the classes and hope this program helps support your fitness goals.
